name: Iva
description:
Iva the clam starts out its day, living on Clam Island. But this day was unlike any other, as a pearl was washed up upon the shore. Curious, Iva comes closer to the pearl. The pearl carries a magical power, and Iva was taken to another island. Iva discovers there are more worlds other than Clam Island, and each world also has their own pearl. Wanting for adventure, Iva sets off to collect the other pearls.

N.B. Because this game is a prototype, expect features yet to be polished and various glitches.
